# resize window wsize = (WindowWidth, newWindowHeight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgWindowPos.x() , orgWindowPos.y() + int((windowHeight - newWindowHeight)/2) ))
